scripts.dev: echo '🚀 ZION 2.7.1 Universal Dashboard Awakening...' && echo '⚡ JAI RAM SITA HANUMAN - Full Frontend Integration! ⚡' && next dev -p 3007
scripts.build: echo '🌌 Cosmic build ceremony for production deployment...' && next build && echo '✨ ZION 2.7.1 Frontend Build Complete! ✨'
scripts.start: echo '🚀 ZION 2.7.1 Stargate portal opening for production...' && next start -p 3007
scripts.lint: echo '🎯 Oracle validates ZION 2.7.1 code quality...' && next lint
scripts.dev-blessing: echo '🌟 ZION 2.7.1 Cosmic development session begins!' && ../scripts/cosmic-dev-blessing.sh && npm run dev
scripts.production: echo '🏭 ZION 2.7.1 Production deployment starting...' && npm run build && npm run start
